description: Vanir is a Duke of Hell and one of the generals in the army of the Devil King. His appearance suggests that he wears a mask, but in truth the mask is his real body. He possesses clairvoyance and is able to read into anyone who isn`t about as or more powerful, or extremely cunning. He uses this ability to goad people into deep frustration, thereby proceeding to prey on their negative emotions, which he greatly enjoys.
name: Vanir
